Articles.Content: So I have recently been playing kerbal space program .90 and was using mech jeb. Now with the new update to 1.0, it is not compatible. Anyone know when Mechjeb will update, and be usable for 1.0?

> 
> So I have recently been playing kerbal space program .90 and was using mech jeb. Now with the new update to 1.0, it is not compatible. Anyone know when Mechjeb will update, and be usable for 1.0?

They're working on it, I downloaded a dev version from about 2 hrs ago, but I closed the tab so I don't have the link. It's in the mechjeb thread though...
